Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -pPassword123! -e "
USE onlyarts;

-- Update admin account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$fMJ1m.zQA/t9PZRSB0ysbekn2NtE92Mrt2bYiwEeaRj6xd24Frtaa'',
    role = ''admin''
WHERE email = ''admin@test.com'';

-- Update free account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$yTCdxliN.h2/ksYf50.gjeRmGKQaEqzYIfQJ6N1OVCcZKDKNOhmJ.'',
    subscription_tier = ''free''
WHERE email = ''free@test.com'';

-- Update plus account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$yUinfvgZqu3PvHTSaaBZxOL0R2BEIcYIlZu6Sv0CU.9wPmpucrrEi'',
    subscription_tier = ''plus''
WHERE email = ''plus@test.com'';

-- Update premium account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$C2xseCUeazDENlLcA.U4g.1eiWZ5cqV3CDy74QujZ6pBCDAzA6/2a'',
    subscription_tier = ''premium''
WHERE email = ''premium@test.com'';

-- Show updated accounts
SELECT id, username, email, role, subscription_tier FROM users WHERE email IN (''admin@test.com'', ''free@test.com'', ''plus@test.com'', ''premium@test.com'');
")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -pPassword123! -e "USE onlyarts; SHOW COLUMNS FROM users LIKE ''subscription_tier'';")

Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -pPassword123! -e "
USE onlyarts;

-- Update admin account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$fMJ1m.zQA/t9PZRSB0ysbekn2NtE92Mrt2bYiwEeaRj6xd24Frtaa'',
    role = ''admin''
WHERE email = ''admin@test.com'';

-- Update free account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$yTCdxliN.h2/ksYf50.gjeRmGKQaEqzYIfQJ6N1OVCcZKDKNOhmJ.'',
    subscription_tier = ''free''
WHERE email = ''free@test.com'';

-- Update basic (was plus) account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$yUinfvgZqu3PvHTSaaBZxOL0R2BEIcYIlZu6Sv0CU.9wPmpucrrEi'',
    subscription_tier = ''basic'',
    username = ''userbasic''
WHERE email = ''plus@test.com'';

-- Update premium account
UPDATE users 
SET password_hash = ''$2b$10$C2xseCUeazDENlLcA.U4g.1eiWZ5cqV3CDy74QujZ6pBCDAzA6/2a'',
    subscription_tier = ''premium''
WHERE email = ''premium@test.com'';

-- Show updated accounts
SELECT id, username, email, role, subscription_tier, ''password listed below'' as note FROM users WHERE email IN (''admin@test.com'', ''free@test.com'', ''plus@test.com'', ''premium@test.com'');
")
